Name: Search 4 Bigfoot
About the game: In Search for Bigfoot, you search for Bigfoot. That's it. It's a dark night in the forest, and something is lurking just beyond the trees. Can you find Bigfoot before he finds you? Collect hair, scat and any other pieces of evidence you come across on your quest to track down the most elusive beast of them all. The mighty, and stealthy, Bigfoot. He's out there somewhere, and he is watching you.
